pages.text: Druden are fire-fearing forest demons affiliated with Herne, who partake in the wild hunt. They embody the depths of the woods, and are known to kill those who walk astray in their domain. As mentioned, they are weak to fire, so carry fire-based enchantments or even a trusty flint and steel to take them out.

In addition, they may spawn with a thyrsus, a magic staff made from fennel, ivy, and pinecones. This staff has an iron barb hidden in the pinecone, allowing it to pierce foes. But this staff can also be used on animals via right-clicking to either tame or breed them, at the cost of durability.
